entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
